name: Vacuum Trasher
description:
Inspired by the trash collecting mechanic from Blinx the Time Sweeper (though Kirby did it first, but the point still stands).

Trasher, with his trusty vacuum goes through the roofs collecting garbage while propelling himself to where he needs to go. Submission for the Mix and Game Jam 2019.

Did everything by myself (for better or worse). I hope you enjoy.

Left Mouse: Shoot

Right Mouse: Vacuum

R Button: Reset
